Best Air Fryers 2026

Curated picks for the best air fryers of 2026, ranked by value, ease of use, and everyday fit. As air fryers continue to gain popularity for their ability to create crispy, delicious meals with less oil, finding the right model can be overwhelming. This guide aims to simplify your decision-making process by providing an overview of the top air fryers available this year.

Overview

Air fryers have revolutionized the way we cook, offering a healthier alternative to traditional frying methods. They use hot air circulation to cook food evenly and quickly, resulting in a crispy texture without the need for excessive oil. In 2026, the market is filled with various models, each boasting unique features and capabilities. Our curated list highlights the best options based on performance, user reviews, and overall value.

How We Evaluated

To determine the best air fryers of 2026, we considered several key factors:

  • Performance: How well the air fryer cooks food, including crispiness and evenness.
  • Ease of Use: User-friendly controls and straightforward operation.
  • Capacity: The size of the cooking basket and its suitability for different household sizes.
  • Cleaning: How easy it is to clean the air fryer after use.
  • Value: Overall cost in relation to features and performance.

How to Choose

When selecting the best air fryer for your needs, consider the following factors:

  • Household Size: Choose a model with a capacity that suits your cooking needs. Smaller models are ideal for individuals or couples, while larger models cater to families.
  • Cooking Functions: Look for air fryers that offer multiple cooking functions, such as baking, roasting, and reheating, for added versatility.
  • Ease of Cleaning: Opt for models with dishwasher-safe parts or non-stick surfaces to simplify the cleaning process.
  • Price: Determine your budget and look for models that offer the best value for the features you desire.
  • Reviews: Consider user reviews to gauge the performance and reliability of the air fryer you are considering.

FAQ

What is an air fryer?

An air fryer is a kitchen appliance that cooks food by circulating hot air around it, creating a crispy outer layer similar to frying but with significantly less oil.

Are air fryers healthy?

Yes, air fryers are considered healthier than traditional frying methods as they require little to no oil, reducing the overall fat and calorie content of meals.

Can I cook frozen food in an air fryer?

Absolutely! Air fryers are excellent for cooking frozen foods, allowing you to achieve a crispy texture without the need for thawing.

How do I clean my air fryer?

Most air fryers have removable, dishwasher-safe parts. For best results, clean the basket and tray after each use with warm soapy water or place them in the dishwasher.

What can I cook in an air fryer?

Air fryers can cook a wide variety of foods, including vegetables, meats, frozen snacks, and even baked goods. Their versatility makes them a valuable addition to any kitchen.
